articles.title: European ‘super cartel’ busted in six countries; 49 arrests, 30 tons of cocaine seized - Fox News
articles.description: Law enforcement in six different countries teamed up to take down a "super cartel" of drug traffickers controlling about one third of the cocaine trade in Europe.
articles.content:
Law enforcement across Europe teamed up to bust a "super cartel" of drug traffickers who control about one third of the cocaine trade in Europe, European authorities said Monday.

articles.title: NHS England to fast-track prostate drug which can prolong survival by years - The Telegraph
articles.description: It will be the first health service in Europe to offer it after a post-Brexit partnership between UK, US and Australian medicines regulators
articles.content:
A prostate cancer drug which can extend survival by years will be fast-tracked by the NHS.
